sources.title: 1957 - The Tattered Dress - El vestido roto - Jack Arnold - VOSE
The Tattered Dress (1957) - Full Movie (No Burned-In Subtitles)
sources.description: The Tattered Dress (1957) - Full Movie (No Burned-In Subtitles) - Starring Jeff Chandler, Jeanne Crain, and Jack Carson

metadata.Plot: After a wild night, wealthy Michael Reston's adulterous wife Charleen comes home with her ripe young body barely concealed by a dress in rags; murder results. Top defense lawyer J.G. Blane, whose own marriage exists in name only, arrives in Desert View, Nevada to find the townsfolk and politically powerful Sheriff Hoak distinctly hostile to the Restons. In due course, Blane discovers he's been "taken for a ride," and that quiet desert communities can be deadly...
metadata.Actors: Jeff Chandler, Jeanne Crain, Jack Carson
